caption.p: (a) Organisation of the RNA genome of SARS-CoV-2 with selected genes (Wuhan-Hu-1 isolate MN908947). (b) Schematic representation of polyprotein cleavage sites of SARS-CoV-2. The papain-like protease PL pro cleaves at 3 distinct sites. The main protease M pro (also referred to as 3CL pro) cleaves at 11 distinct sites.
